outputs.output_descr:
The Initiation Plan is meant to spearhead certain essential activities of the planned UNDP/UCNDF Territorial Development Support Project (PADTH) which is still in a resource mobilization phase. The IP will work on three main areas : 
(i) Knowledge & institutional support to the Ministry of Interior, 
(ii) early recovery of disaster-hit municipal administrations, and 
(iii) strategies for local economic development. Activities will be implemented jointly by UNDP and UNCDF and in close collaboration with the Ministry of Interior and Local Governments, and the Ministry of Planning.

project_descr: Plan d'Initiation du Programme de Développement Territorial en Haiti (PADTH)
